reviewText: Great movie is awesome! I wish it will put it back on amazon along with Cars 2007 VHS

This movie is my son's favorite and he is only 2 years old!  He watches it in the morning before school and watches it again when he gets home from school.  It's nice because I have watched it several times with him, and unlike a cartoon, it doesn't become annoying.  I enjoy it also!

This movie is based on the nick show "drake and josh". I loved this movie because it is based on the show,and has lots of action. Everything from putting there little sister on the wrong flight to steeling cars to being taken hostage and even playning on mtvs trl. If you are a fan of "drake and Josh" you will love this move! I SURE LOVED IT!
